[OnSucceedAttack] If target's Speed is slower than this unit's, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]

text.name: I Shall Summon the Time

1030921.name: T Corp. Physics Distortion Field
1030921.desc: When 1 ally with the slowest Speed takes damage from enemies with [Vibration], take -10% damage

1030901.name: Golden Time - Extracting
1030901.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

When this unit loses [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], gain +8 [Aggro] to one of this unit's Skill Slots next turn

main: Defense gives her {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality} which buffs her for the next 3 turns giving her 3, then 2, then 1 stack of {status:Agility}, {status:ParryingResultUp}, and {status:Vulnerable}. On the 4th turn she gets 6 {status:Binding} and 8 {status:Aggro}. This sequence can't be overwritten by defending again, but you can start it again on the 4th turn when she loses the status.

S3 consumes 10 {status:Vibration} Potency from her target to inflict {status:TimeSuspend}. If she has {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}, she doesn't consume {status:Vibration} on the enemy, but still needs it to be present. It also triggers a {status:VibrationExplosion} and a {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationChainPersonality} if her target is slower.

{status:TimeSuspend} prevents the enemy from receiving damage for 2 turns (the current and the next turn), instead collecting all that damage to deal 130% of that total as {keyword:Sloth} damage at the end of the 2nd turn. You can end the effect and get the burst damage early by applying another instance of {status:TimeSuspend} whether from Don or from the other T corp. Identities.

{status:VibrationChainPersonality} converts the current {status:Vibration} stack into {status:VibrationChainPersonality}, reducing the enemy's Clash Power by 1 for every 10 {status:Vibration} Potency up to a max of -3, while still working with any other usual effects of {status:Vibration}.
other: S3 consumes 10 {status:Vibration} Count from herself to gain Coin Power

Gains {status:Vibration} Count on S1 and S2. S2 consumes Potency from her target to apply double the amount as Count to herself, while also applying {status:Binding} and triggering {status:VibrationExplosion}.
When her passive is active, she also gets a free heal if she has 10-20% HP at turn end. This does not work if she dies or drops below 10%.
